title: Nightmare on Design Street: How We Adapt When Tech Gets Terrifying w/ John Lloyd

location.name: Crews Center for Entrepreneurship, 2nd Floor - University of Memphis

summary: AI might feel like the biggest shift we've faced in our careers — but it's not the first, and it won't be the last. Join John Lloyd, a seasoned design leader and former Senior Director of Design, as he shares spooky tales of adapting to waves of technological change. description.whoIsThisFor: This MeetUp is for Memphis' community of designers, developers, and anyone curious about the ever-changing world of technology. agenda.details: Grab some food, say hello, and connect with others in the room.

Spooky Tales of Adapting to Tech

AI might feel like the biggest shift we've faced in our careers — but it's not the first, and it won't be the last. Our speaker, a seasoned design leader and former Senior Director of Design, will share stories from their own journey adapting to waves of technological change. From major pivots to ongoing challenges and future predictions, this talk is all about navigating an industry that never stands still.

The key takeaway? Tools will always evolve — but timeless skills like craft, principles, relationships, communication, and empathy are far harder to replace with robots or new platforms. Join us for an insightful discussion about what stays constant when everything else changes, all from a designer's perspective.

We'll wrap up with conversation, connection, and appreciation for everyone who made the night possible. Expect shoutouts for upcoming events, a group photo, and space for feedback before we close out the evening.
